meaning_str.bing:
n. 会议；会面；集会；集合
v. “meet”的现在分词
网络. 会见；开会；聚会

会议；集会；聚会；碰面；相遇；会合；宗教集会；研讨会；座谈会；论坛；接触；汇合处；交汇点
开会；集会；召开会议；相遇；遭遇；碰见；会见；接触；会晤；（meet的现在分词）

sogou-CET6.n: 会议[出现6次)];会面[出现1次)]

sogou-CET4.n: 会议[出现10次)];会面[出现3次)]

1.en: Carey made the decision to pull the BSkyB bid in a meeting this morning in London, a person familiar with the matter said.
1.cn: 据一位知情人士透露，詹姆斯及其父亲和凯里在周四早间伦敦的一个会议上做出了撤销对英国天空广播收购的决定。

2.en: He insisted that we (should )take up the matter at the meeting.
2.cn: 他坚持要我们在会上提出这个问题。

3.en: But Director-General Margaret Chan, as she opened the World Health Assembly, noted that the delegates are meeting at a time of tragedy.
3.cn: 但是，正如世卫组织总干事陈冯富珍在世界卫生大会开幕时所说的，与会代表在一个悲剧时刻参加了大会。

0.en: And at that meeting, that's when that photograph was taken.
0.cn: 照片就是拍摄于那次会议。

1.en: Guys, hey, hold up. We need a staff meeting. Everyone, a staff meeting.
1.cn: 大伙儿，嗨，等一下。我们得开个全体会议，大家都过来 开全体会议。

2.en: The Council of Elrond. It's from the Lord Of The Rings. It's the meeting where they decide to destroy the One ring.
2.cn: 爱隆的会议来自《指环王》，在那个会议上他们决定毁掉魔戒。

3.en: The system admin was in the meeting and accused me of spying on him.
3.cn: 系统主管也参加了会议说我监视他。

4.en: How do you know that? Why does Elrond mean secret meeting?
4.cn: 你怎么知道的？为什么爱隆的意思是秘密会议？

5.en: Oh, and thank you for closing the diner tonight for this meeting.
5.cn: 应该谢谢你们为了这次会议今晚特意闭餐。

6.en: You just bought yourself a one-way ticket back to the typing pool. This meeting is over.
6.cn: 你这样离降职不远了，会议结束。

7.en: Summon a meeting of the seven dwarf families, demand they stand by their oath.
7.cn: 召集七大矮人家族的会议要求他们信守誓言。

8.en: Movie theater, the occasional classified meeting. I know what you're doing.
8.cn: 电影院，偶尔的秘密会议。我知道你在干什么。

9.en: Who? Well, when Mr. Bishop was here last week, who was in the meeting?
9.cn: 是谁？这，毕夏普先生上周在这儿，谁参与了会议？

10.en: I don't know. I will be readying an order of protection right after this meeting.
10.cn: 不知道。会议之后我会立刻准备申请保护令。

11.en: Oh, hi, are you here for the meeting? Yeah, we're Smiley Time Daycare.
11.cn: 你们好，是来参加会议的吗？对，我们是微笑托儿所。

12.en: Ah, yes. I have a note here from Mr. Mahmud. That meeting is no longer as well.
12.cn: 对了，这有穆罕默德先生给您的留言，会议也取消了。

13.en: I don't have two days. As a matter of fact, I have to go to a client meeting right now.
13.cn: 我可没两天时间，实际上我现在就要去参加客户会议。

14.en: Will wants me in the Chumhum meeting. Why? He wants a partner there.
14.cn: 威尔l想让我参加查查网公司的会议。为什么？他想要个合伙人参加。

15.en: Fine. Make a motion at the next meeting. When is that? It's the first Saturday of every month. Unless there's an emergency meeting.
15.cn: 行。请在下次开会时提出动议。什么时候？每个月的第一个周六。除非有召开紧急会议。

16.en: I'll have to go up to London, which is a nuisance, but there you are. How did the meeting go?
16.cn: 我明天得去趟伦敦，真烦人，但该去还是得去，会议如何？

17.en: That sneaky bastard has canceled the meeting and he wants us to pay for the room from now on.
17.cn: 那个该死的混蛋居然取消了会议，还让我们从今天开始自付房费。

18.en: What the hell is Project Elrond? I had to make something up. But, Elrond? Because it's a secret meeting.
18.cn: 爱隆计划是什么鬼？我得亡羊补牢。但是爱隆？因为这是个秘密会议。

19.en: Then we call an emergency meeting. You really don't have to. This is the first Saturday of the month.
19.cn: 那我们就开紧急会议。你真不需要这么做。今天就是本月的第一个周六。
